SQLResource.query: SELECT C.COMP_CD , C.CONTENT_SEQ , C.CONTENT_FG , C.CONTENT_DIV1 , C.CONTENT_DIV2 , C.SUBJECT , REPLACE(C.CONTENT, '@$', CHR(13)||CHR(10)) AS CONTENT , C.TEMPLETE_ID , C.REPLACE_CONTENT , C.BRAND_CD , C.SEND_POINT , C.MBS_DIV , C.USE_YN , NVL(U.USER_NM, C.UPD_USER) AS UPD_USER , TO_CHAR(C.UPD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPD_DT FROM CS_CONTENT C , ( SELECT COMP_CD , USER_ID , USER_NM FROM HQ_USER WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} ) U WHERE C.COMP_CD = U.COMP_CD(+) AND C.UPD_USER = U.USER_ID(+) AND C.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND C.CONTENT_FG = ${SCH_CONTENT_FG} AND C.STOR_CD IS NULL AND (${SCH_CONTENT_DIV1} IS NULL OR C.CONTENT_DIV1 = ${SCH_CONTENT_DIV1}) AND (${SCH_CONTENT_DIV2} IS NULL OR C.CONTENT_DIV2 = ${SCH_CONTENT_DIV2}) AND (${SCH_USE_YN} IS NULL OR C.USE_YN = ${SCH_USE_YN}) ORDER BY C.CONTENT_DIV1, C.CONTENT_DIV2, C.CONTENT_SEQ
